entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
